recipe.ingredients: - dried chamomile flowers: 2 tablespoons - dried lavender buds: 1 tablespoon - dried lemon balm: 1 tablespoon - dried mint leaves: 1 tablespoon - dried rose petals (optional): 1/2 tablespoon
recipe.directions: 1. Mix Herbs: In a small bowl, combine the dried chamomile flowers, dried lavender buds, dried lemon balm, dried mint leaves, and dried rose petals if using. 2. Store: Transfer the blend to an airtight container and store in a cool, dry place away from direct sunlight. 3. Brew Tea: To brew a cup of tea, use about 1 teaspoon of the herbal blend per cup of boiling water. Steep for 5-10 minutes, then strain. 4. Serve: Enjoy the tea hot, or let it cool and serve over ice for a refreshing drink. Sweeten with honey or stevia if desired.
